description:
I created an instance from volume, then I created a instance snapshot by volume backend. I discovered that the extra image properties is not passed to the volume api's function，and this volume's snapshot metadata is missing in cinder database.
This parameter should be passed to the function of create_snapshot_force(), when creating an instance snapshot by volume backend.
title: Calling of volume_api.create_snapshot_force() should pass the parameter of extra image metadata.

comments.content:
I created an instance from volume, then I created a instance snapshot by volume backend. I discovered that the extra image properties is not passed to volume api's function.
This parameter should be passed to the function of create_snapshot_force(), when creating an instance snapshot by volume backend.
